SEARCH
Package gw.api.iso

Class ISOEditableRequest

java.lang.Object
gw.api.iso.ISOEditableRequest
public class ISOEditableRequest extends Object
Allows modification of the XML in an ISORequest after the initial XML generation is complete. This allows customers to add in customer specific fields and, potentially, add in fields needed for other ISO services.

The constructor for the class takes the generated XML, plus any XPaths that were specified when the ISORequest object was first created. It applies these initial XPaths and the ISOEditableRequest then makes available an XPath utility object that can be used to further modify the XML. When all modifications are complete the getPayloadOrThrow() or getPayload() methods can be called to generate the payload as an XML string.

The methods that generate the final payload also:

  • take care of adding in CodeList elements for any new codelistref attributes that got added during payload modification
  • check for any fields required by the given claim search type (if non null)
Author:
tmorris

  • Method Details

    • getXPath

      public XPath getXPath()
      An XPath object which can be used to get, set, copy and remove elements from the request
      Returns:
      XPath object, never null

    • getPayloadOrThrow

      public String getPayloadOrThrow() throws com.guidewire.cc.system.integration.messaging.iso.ISOConfigurationException
      Add in any missing code lists, check for required fields and then return the entire ACORD request as an XML string. Throws ISOConfigurationException if any required fields are missing.
      Returns:
      ACORD request as XML string, never null
      Throws:
      com.guidewire.cc.system.integration.messaging.iso.ISOConfigurationException - if there are missing required fields

    • getPayload

      public String getPayload()
      Add in any missing code lists, check for required fields and then return the entire ACORD request as an XML string. Logs a message and returns null if any required fields are missing
      Returns:
      ACORD request as XML string, or null if required fields are missing

    • getClaimPartyId

      public String getClaimPartyId(String ClaimPartyRoleCd)
      Get the claim party Id for the specified ClaimParyRoleCd in the XML payload. It returns null if no claim party is found for the specified ClaimPartyRoleCd. This function can be used when user needs to add the ClaimsPartyRelationship Aggregate information to the payload.
      Parameters:
      ClaimPartyRoleCd - ClaimPartyRoleCd defined by ISO.
      Returns:
      The claim party id
